StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAllMirsMetSiteVtest]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SELECT -1 AS ID, [MIRS_MET_SITE_VTEST_CODE] AS Code, [MIRS_MET_SITE_VTEST_NAME] + ' (' + [MIRS_MET_SITE_VTEST_MEPS] + ')' AS Descrip.on FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[MIRS_MET_SITE_VTEST] WITH (NOLOCK) ORDER BY [MIRS_MET_SITE_VTEST_NAME]
